Easily create a nice looking tooltips.

Usage

  • Simply add the data-tooltip-content attribute to an element
  • Add the data-tooltip-class attribute, to specify a style
  • Add the data-tooltip-direction attribute to adjust the tooltip's direction

Tooltips automatically reposition so that they won't exceed the browser window size.

Style

Hover Me Info Hover Me Warning Hover Me Error

Direction

Top Right Bottom Left
